author: hammant
msg: Updated Cornerstone, pool, thread.  Remove dupe 'compile' target. Remove AltRMI libs (not used no more)

author: leosutic
msg: Attached is a small patch for the XPathProcessorImpl from excalibur xmlutil.
It solves the problem that XPath expressions like "/a/b" don't return
any result, even if there are elements in the document conforming to
that XPath expression. (these kind of expressions were actually
throwing exceptions but those are silently catched -- something I'll
The purpose of Xalan's PrefixResolver.handlesNullPrefixes() method
is not entirely clear to me, but returning false helps (which is also what
Xalan itself does in all of its PrefixResolver implementations).

author: bloritsch
msg: add initial cut at determining shutdown order.  Now I need to add support for it.
